edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.scheduler

Interface ILauncher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuroraLauncher, KubernetesLauncher, MesosLauncher, MPILauncher, NomadLauncher

    public interface ILauncher
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Launches job. The purpose of the launcher is to bring up the required processes. After it brings up the required processes, the controller is used for managing the job.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Cleanup any resources
      void initialize(Config config)
      Initialize with the configuration
      Twister2JobState launch(JobAPI.Job job)
      Launch the processes according to the requested resources.
      boolean terminateJob(java.lang.String jobID)
      terminate the submitted job
